text: anyone have any idea why the FA icons donâ€™t seem to be loading on staging - <http://www-brandle-net.sandbox.hs-sites.com/homepage> but i can see them inside the preview in the design manager. for example in the navbar the search icon doesnt appear
It looks like your font awesome css is getting a 403. You are using pro so they are probably protecting the file, did you try whitelisting the staging domain on your font awesome account?
Would I be able to swap that out to just use the free version?

You can, you'd just be limited to the free icons then, so only these:
<https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&m=free>
Can you point me in the right direction to swap it out?
oh i think i found it
seems like its in the footer global module
thank you so much for the help lindsey!

NP, though you should be placing the css links in the <head></head> of the page, so you'll want to remove the current link that is for the pro css and use the free version found on their site
<https://fontawesome.com/start>
